title: Nicholas3_
author: Nicholas3_
content: Strong foundation sets the groundwork for future growth and development. So is the case with Oscar swap it is built on the most authentic trending and safe arbitrum blockchain. Over the past years crypto users have got frustrated due to high fee and speed issues.this problem leads to crytpo downfall as well but oscar has provided the solution of these problems. Oscar has differentiate itself from its competitors by adding more value to Dex to enhance customer satisfaction. Traders , liquidity providers and yieldfarms stakers are essential to maximize the profits. Oscar swap has team up with verified bridge to give unlimited access for investments to it's users. catogeries have been made in staking for the ease people. Token value has been increased with the addition of liquidity in it. If anybody wishes to make his or her one doller worth hunder dollar after just two decades so without any ado invest it at 500% APR with Oscarswap Farm

comments.author: poodle63
comments.body: Do you a part of oscar team swap or what? is not it better to create your announcement thread? I never heard this one in arbitrum ecosystem. Im very often to hear arbiswap rather than oscar swap. it's likely brand new decentralized exchange site. It seemss like that there are no lots of user in this platform. I just see that based on the liquidity. Why don't you make a partnership with arbitrum foundation to prove your service was legit?

comments.author: Fundamentals Of
comments.body: Lol. If you want to effectively introduce your project here, please do it properly and in an appealing manner. I think you should instead create an announcement thread detailing Oscar Swap's features and why people should use it. But with how you presented Oscar Swap, I think I immediately disregard the platform. I think it is not worth any trust. You started describing a platform that accordingly provides a solution to certain problems, but you ended up promising to turn 1 dollar into a hundred dollars. You are offering an investment with 500% APR. Those are serious red flags. Would you care to justify them?

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: There are enough red flags in your thread to make anyone think twice before investing, the rhetoric you mention is emotional and doesn't sound scientifically based, fees haven't become an issue for most cryptocurrencies, confirmation speed is too, 500% APR sounds too good to be true. So what you are trying to promote is SCAMMMMM.Are you from the developer team?

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: Nicholas3_ on April 19, 2023, 07:13:31 PM Strong foundation sets the groundwork for future growth and development. So is the case with Oscar swap it is built on the most authentic trending and safe arbitrum blockchain. Over the past years crypto users have got frustrated due to high fee and speed issues.this problem leads to crytpo downfall as well but oscar has provided the solution of these problems. Oscar has differentiate itself from its competitors by adding more value to Dex to enhance customer satisfaction. Traders , liquidity providers and yieldfarms stakers are essential to maximize the profits. Oscar swap has team up with verified bridge to give unlimited access for investments to it's users. catogeries have been made in staking for the ease people. Token value has been increased with the addition of liquidity in it. If anybody wishes to make his or her one doller worth hunder dollar after just two decades so without any ado invest it at 500% APR with Oscarswap FarmIt looks like you are stuck in 2017. Its 2023. You can do an instant swap (max 3-6 sec) for less than a dollar using Pancake Swap and BSC network.500% apy changes $100  into $1.5 million in just 6 years. Explain to me why anyone would pay such high interest rates when they might as well borrow from a bank? Where will the money come from to pay 1.5 million after 6 years to everyone who had $100? Who will pay that? Who will lose in this trade? I guess anyone who believes in this scam..

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: 500 APR or more is real. But the real question there is the stability. Apparently high APR tends to go down as per users shares increases on the pool. Thats normal and happening to a lot of projects. So the percentage here isnt really a good offer especially if its a new launch project. I think many will be discourage by that, or pick other new finance defi instead of that. By any chance? Ate you a promoter or shiller of this project oscarswap?

comments.author: fvb
comments.body: Yes, of course this is something new and unknown to anyone. So people just walk by. I noticed that such posts are constantly written by newbies with newly created accounts

comments.author: siniminomorocomunisakito
comments.body: In my opinion, Oscar Swap is taking the necessary steps to ensure its long-term success by prioritizing customer satisfaction and continuing to add value to its platform. By building a secure and trending blockchain, overcoming user frustration with high fees and slow speeds, and partnering with verified bridges for unlimited investment access, Oscar Swap is positioning itself for growth.The platform's focus on increasing token value through added liquidity and staking categories further demonstrates its commitment to providing opportunities for investors to maximize profits. And with a 500% APR on investment, Oscar Swap's Farm is an attractive option for those looking for high returns.Overall Oscar Swap's approach to creating value and success for the platform and its users looks promising, and its dedication to meeting user needs and increasing customer satisfaction is a positive sign for its future growth.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: Nicholas3_ on April 19, 2023, 07:13:31 PMToken value has been increased with the addition of liquidity in it. If anybody wishes to make his or her one doller worth hunder dollar after just two decades so without any ado invest it at 500% APR with Oscarswap FarmThis looks like more of paid post.I have never come across this swap for any day or even read about them on news site. The surprising part of it is that offering 500 percent APR, is this to attract investors or people's attention? Are you among the project team or founder with the way you wrote about them there is a hidden plans towards this content you created.Anyone investing is liable for their lost because i see no quality or value for someone to use this swap while we have reputable swap and dex over there to be used. BE WARNED!!!
